name: YM Contact Display
author: Young Minds

sections.description: You can use this plugin to display your company name, address, phone, fax and email in very relevant way.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and Upload ym-contact-display.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or Upload the zip from the WordPress Admin > plugin > Add Plugin > Upload Plugin
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance > Widgets and drag the widget to desired sidebar and configure it as necessary.
sections.faq:
Can I use my existing WordPress theme?

Yes, ofcourse ðŸ™‚

Will this work on WordPress multisite?

Yes! If your WordPress installation has multisite enabled, this plugin will work with no error.

Where can I get support?

The support blog can be found at http://www.youngminds.com.np/wordpress/ym-contact-display/

Where can I report a bug?

This is a very simple and straight forward plugin and hence there should not be any severe bugs. However, if you face any, then plesae Report bugs at http://www.youngminds.com.np/wordpress/ym-contact-display/ and we will refine them.
